attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for people who are fedup with Racism in this country, and would like the fines to be increased, and more action taken, to sort out domestic abuse in this country!

Racism has been around for centuries, and people are under attack from it everyday, and this needs to stop NOW!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
